            秘🚫！强烈推荐前端佬，要知道的技术网站！
            <!----> <!----></h1> <div class="author-info-block block-hidden" data-v-b21437b8=""><div class="author-info-box" data-v-b21437b8=""><div class="author-name" data-v-b21437b8=""><a href="/user/4391901700043284/posts" target="_blank" rel="" class="jj-link username username ellipsis" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-1800aadb="" data-v-b21437b8=""><span class="name" style="max-width:160px;" data-v-65b50b51="" data-v-1800aadb="">
    大怪v
  </span> <!----> <!----> <!----> </a></div> <div class="meta-box" data-v-b21437b8=""><time datetime="2025-01-03T14:49:43.000Z" title="Fri Jan 03 2025 14:49:43 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)" class="time" data-v-b21437b8="">
                    2025-01-03
                  </time> <svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="read-icon" data-v-b21437b8=""><path d="M7.90078 2.80078C4.49278 2.80078 1.74745 6.11672 0.800781 7.77469C1.74745 9.58339 4.49278 13.2008 7.90078 13.2008C11.3088 13.2008 14.0541 9.58339 15.0008 7.77469C14.0541 6.11672 11.3088 2.80078 7.90078 2.80078Z" stroke="currentColor" data-v-b21437b8=""></path><circle cx="7.89922" cy="8.00078" r="2.2" stroke="currentColor" data-v-b21437b8=""></circle></svg> <span class="views-count" data-v-b21437b8="">
                    13,953
                  </span> <span class="read-time" data-v-b21437b8=""><svg width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" data-v-b21437b8=""><rect width="16" height="16" fill="none" data-v-b21437b8=""></rect><circle cx="8" cy="8" r="5.65625" stroke="#8A919F" data-v-b21437b8=""></circle><path d="M7.69141 5.18652V8.30924H10.8141" stroke="#8A919F" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" data-v-b21437b8=""></path></svg>
                    阅读2分钟
                  </span> <!----></div></div> <div style="flex:1;" data-v-b21437b8=""></div> <!----> <!----></div> <!----> <!----> <!----> <img src="//lf-web-assets.juejin.cn/obj/juejin-web/xitu_juejin_web/img/banner.a5c9f88.jpg" style="width:100%;height:auto;display:block;" data-v-b21437b8=""> <div id="article-root" itemprop="articleBody" class="main" data-v-b21437b8=""><div class="article-viewer markdown-body result"><h2 data-id="heading-0">1、<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgs.statcounter.com%2F" target="_blank" title="https://gs.statcounter.com/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">gs.statcounter.com/</a></h2>
<p>全球浏览器份额占比数据查询网站主页如下：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/03f60c13712643f19894be3a9e4ab6f9~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5aSn5oCqdg==:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1742605489&amp;x-signature=VfUHpa1qZ0yIcJtN1yHSsrZ%2FliE%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>网站可以查阅PC端浏览器占比份额，也可以查询移动端占比份额，还可以单独查询每个浏览器版本单独占比份额，提供自定义图表设置。</p>
<p>查阅完浏览器份额，还可以查询目前主流屏幕宽度市场份额，从宽屏到小屏幕都有，此外还有一些操作系统占比份额。</p>
<p>如果你是leader，恰巧你需要一些汇报，恰巧你的领导还喜欢数据佐证结论，那你贴上上面的一些数据，那是相当拉风！！！</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/2660ca81141446f4a7a8551bcf6c1564~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5aSn5oCqdg==:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1742605489&amp;x-signature=DG7yE1UnllPkMzB2HBJ9NiyE7b8%3D" alt="2.gif" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><del>汇报忽悠</del>，你，值得拥有！</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">2、<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fbrowsersl.ist%2F" target="_blank" title="https://browsersl.ist/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">browsersl.ist/</a></h2>
<p>前端佬在现代NPM工程化开发方式下，都会在package.json中配置browserslist。如果正好你迷惑具体的参数到底代表了啥，那就打开这个网站吧。</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/5c12e1ff98c042eb8ac1738bd4d2d62c~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5aSn5oCqdg==:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1742605489&amp;x-signature=MDK9AGvENMEPspCn7IXl0citpKI%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>这个网站可以测算配置browserslist浏览器配置大致的占比份额，Region处还可以指定国家，数据非常详细，精确到每个浏览器的版本。</p>
<p>接上面，又多了一个哔哔哔哔哔哔哔哔的来源。</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">3、<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fcaniuse.com%2F" target="_blank" title="https://caniuse.com/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">caniuse.com/</a></h2>
<p>这个没啥说的了，应该是个前端佬都知道吧？</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/5fb5373bc4f8491ba260329b6bc9b1ac~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5aSn5oCqdg==:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1742605489&amp;x-signature=Bzy1LW7%2BbyE5IHqnAMnRPvGubZs%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">4、<a href="https://link.juejin.cn?target=https%3A%2F%2Fweb.dev%2F%3Fhl%3Dzh-cn" target="_blank" title="https://web.dev/?hl=zh-cn" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">web.dev/?hl=zh-cn</a></h2>
<p>下面这些图，前端佬应该很熟了。但你知道这些指标怎么来的么？</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/7d9e451310974d7ba94832d90739afa3~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5aSn5oCqdg==:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1742605489&amp;x-signature=TBfxej8%2B%2F3L3KtNR1XYVFAeN7p8%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>去这个网站，找找就知道了！里面很多文章，其中就有谷歌的Chrome浏览器开发者，对于上面这些指标选取的考量是哪些，如下图：</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/e020cec078eb46daa41ea6671a7b0497~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5aSn5oCqdg==:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1742605489&amp;x-signature=TXn%2BtZD6ym94H5rFXfwGm4zZz1g%3D" alt="1735915697147.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>当然，里面也有很多网站优化的方案，很具备参考意义的！！</p>
<p>但，需要<strong>科学上网</strong>才能看到！慎！</p>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">5、<a href="https://www.juejin.cn/" target="_blank" title="https://www.juejin.cn/">www.juejin.cn/</a></h2>
<p>最后这个，强烈推荐！！大家没什么意见吧？</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-xtjj-sign.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-73owjymdk6/d703eacd541c4efb94866495112f3473~tplv-73owjymdk6-jj-mark-v1:0:0:0:0:5o6Y6YeR5oqA5pyv56S-5Yy6IEAg5aSn5oCqdg==:q75.awebp?rk3s=f64ab15b&amp;x-expires=1742605489&amp;x-signature=Zho%2FDSskG5low%2FfY6K1LIez%2BECY%3D" alt="image.png" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>祝周末愉快！</p></div></div>
